description: This file defines a React component for a web page that allows users to initiate OAuth connections to JIRA and Confluence services by redirecting to backend OAuth endpoints. It handles displaying the connection options, managing UI state during redirects, and showing success/error messages based on URL query parameters.

methods.name: ConnectInner
methods.description: React component that manages the OAuth connection UI, handles URL query parameters for success/error messages, and triggers OAuth redirects.

methods.name: startOAuth
methods.description: Initiates OAuth flow by redirecting the browser to the appropriate backend login URL based on the selected provider.
